revised_title: Spatial Solitons and Quantum Effects in Nonlinear Optical Patterns
tldr: This article discusses the field of transverse nonlinear optics, focusing on spatial solitons for parallel information processing and the use of vertical cavity surface emitting lasers as optical switches and logic gates. It also explores quantum aspects of nonlinear optical patterns, including quantum images and critical fluctuations in the degenerate optical parametric oscillator below threshold.
